Plot: Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.
Title: Twister
Actors: Helen Hunt, Bill Paxton, Cary Elwes, Jami Gertz
tomatoConsensus: A high-concept blockbuster that emphasizes special effects over three-dimensional characters, Twister's visceral thrills are often offset by the film's generic plot.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 10 wins & 12 nominations.
